A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not the best Star Wars movie ever\, but an amazing movie nevertheless. Great story\, great character development\, great jokes. It had a few bad moments but overall it is a huge net positive.

I find it amusing how the vast majority of people bashing this movie can't even write a sentence without making spelling mistakes a 13 year old would see. 

Disney is making a truly amazing job with Star Wars but there is no win: they can't do anything that has been done before\, but they can't do anything new either. People think that somehow someone will be able to make a movie that makes them feel like they felt when they first saw the first trilogy. Well\, bad news\, fellas: that's not happening.
